Uses of Class
sage.scene.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    sage.animation  
    sage.scene  

    • Uses of Controller in sage.animation

      Subclasses of Controller in sage.animation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimationController
      An AnimationController is a Controller for SceneNode elements (that is, nodes in the scenegraph) which are Joints that can be animated.

    • Uses of Controller in sage.scene

      Subclasses of Controller in sage.scene 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RotationController
      RotationController is a Controller that applies a continuous (wrapping) rotation to each SceneNode it controls.
      class  TranslationController
      A SAGE scenenode controller that applies a cyclic translation to each node it controls.
      Methods in sage.scene that return Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Controller SceneNode.removeController(Controller contr)
      Removes the specified Controller from the list of controllers currently attached to this SceneNode.
      Methods in sage.scene that return types with arguments of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<Controller> SceneNode.getControllers()
      Returns an Iterator over the set of Controllers currently attached to this SceneNode.
      Methods in sage.scene with parameters of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SceneNode.addController(Controller contr)
      Adds the specified Controller to the set of Controllers currently attached to this node.
      Controller SceneNode.removeController(Controller contr)
      Removes the specified Controller from the list of controllers currently attached to this SceneNode.
